entries.journal_entry_description: A target map lists a location on Lok that has been targeted for explosives.  You should check it out and defuse the bomb if possible.
entries.journal_entry_title: Bomb Target - Lok, Near Nym's Stronghold
entries.task01_task_display_string_1: You have found the bomb on Lok.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Travel to Lok and locate the bomb.
entries.task02_waypoint_name: Bomb Target - Lok, Near Nym's Stronghold
